globalcheckuser-summary:
This tool scans recent changes to retrieve the IP addresses used by a user across all wikis or show the edit/user data for an IP address.
Users and edits by a client IP address can be retrieved via XFF headers by appending the IP address with "/xff". IPv4 (CIDR $1-32) and IPv6 (CIDR $2-128) are supported.
No more than 5,000 edits will be returned for performance reasons.
Use this in accordance with policy.
globalcheckuser-desc: Allows people with the appropriate access to run global checks on users and IP addresses to help combat cross-wiki vandalism. Based off of the original CheckUser extension.
globalcheckuser-logcase: The log search is case sensitive.
right-globalcheckuser: Check user's IP addresses and other information
action-globalcheckuser: check user's IP addresses and other information
globalcheckuser-cidr-label: Find common range and affected IP addresses for a list of IP addresses
globalcheckuser-nomatch-edits:
No matches found.
Last edit was on $1 at $2.
globalcheckuser-recent-checks: Recent global checks for this user
globalcheckuser-massblock-text:
Selected accounts will be blocked indefinitely, with autoblocking of IP addresses enabled and account creation disabled.
IP addresses will be blocked for one week for anonymous users only and account creation will be disabled.
globalcheckuser-blocktalk: Prevent from editing their own talk page while blocked
globalcheckuser-block-noreason: You must give a reason for the blocks.
globalcheckuser-noreason: You must give a reason running a check.
globalcheckuser-too-many:
Too many results (according to global query estimate), please narrow down the CIDR.
Here are the IP addresses used (5000 max, sorted by address):
globalcheckuser-user-nonexistent: The specified user does not exist.
globalcheckuser-limited: '''These results have been truncated for performance reasons.'''
globalcheckuser-toollinks: [[https://www.robtex.com/whois/$1.html WHOIS/RDNS] 路 [https://www.robtex.com/rbls/$1.html RBLs] 路 [http://www.dnsstuff.com/tools/tracert.ch?ip=$1 Traceroute] 路 [https://www.ip2location.com/$1 Geolocate] 路 [https://www.dan.me.uk/torcheck?ip=$1 Tor check]]
globalcheckuser-login-failure: Failed to log in to {{SITENAME}} as $1
globalgroup-checkuser.css: /* CSS placed here will affect checkuser only */
globalgroup-checkuser.js: /* JS placed here will affect checkuser only */
